structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: An electric power system owned and operated by a municipality may establish a home heating assistance fund to receive voluntary contributions from customers to assist individuals in preventing the termination of home heating service. This fund may be administered by the electric power system or through a community action agency or charitable organization that identifies individuals in need and makes such assistance available. This fund shall be administered as described in KRS 278.287.
law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 231, sec. 2, effective July 12, 2006.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). Under the authority of KRS 7.136(1)(c), the Reviser of Statutes has determined that the division of this statute in 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 231, sec. 2, into subsections was unnecessary.
